Noxious 1 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.)[/i]
Compleat {B}{G} [i]({B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a Phyrexian artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
